item.title: Kareem add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kareem add a quote by G. Stanley Hall
item.description: "Gross well says that children are young because they play, and not vice versa; and he might have added, men grow old because they stop playing, and not conversely, for play is, at bottom, growth, and at the top of the intellectual scale it is the eternal type of research from sheer love of truth." -- G. Stanley Hall

item.title: Kareem add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kareem add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kareem add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "After all, the wrong road always leads somewhere." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kareem add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kareem add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kareem add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kareem add a quote by مصطفى إبراهيم
item.description: "أدين بـ دين الجدعنة و بـ دين رفاق الدرب و بـ قولة إحنا مش أنا فـ المعمعة و الضرب و بـ دين ما كنت مصدّقه فـ المعركة الأولى و بـ دين جثث فـ المشرحة أساميها مجهولة و أدين من ساب على الأسفلت اخواته مقتولة و اقوله التوبة مقبولة إلا فـ وقت الحرب" -- مصطفى إبراهيم
